prHeadline: Spell Named a 2021 Gartner® Cool Vendor in Enterprise AI Operationalization and Engineering
headlineTxt: Oct 19, 2021, 02:00 ETSpell Named a 2021 Gartner® Cool Vendor in Enterprise AI Operationalization and EngineeringSpell, the leader in operationalizing AI for natural language processing (NLP), machine vision, and speech recognition applications, has been named a 2021 Gartner Cool Vendor in Enterprise AI Operationalization and Engineering. The namesakeMore news about: Spell Inc.
